message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price, considering its worth to you is $800000. I'm willing to make a concession to make this deal happen.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $850000. Considering its value to me is $1000000, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $875000. I believe this is a fair price, taking into account the value you place on the product and my own expectations. I'm open to further negotiation, but I'm not willing to go below this price.

I understand your position, Alice. I've given this careful consideration, and I'd like to propose a price of $860000. I hope this offer is within your acceptable range, allowing us to come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $860000. Considering the value I place on it, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $880000. I believe this is a fair price, taking into account the value you place on the product and my own expectations. I'm open to further negotiation, but I'm not willing to go below this price.

I see your position, Alice. I've evaluated our negotiations carefully, and I'd like to propose a price of $870000. I hope this offer is within your acceptable range, allowing us to come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $870000.
